content: easy ribbed headband materials 1 5 oz country rose or your choice of color worsted weight yarn size h crochet hook row 1 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook chain 1 turn 8 single_crochet row 2-69 working in back loop only single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn row 70 working in back loop only single_crochet in each single_crochet across fold headband in half lengthwise single_crochet short ends together to form a loop chain 1 edging round 1 working in ends of row 1-70 single_crochet in the end of each row 70 single_crochet slip_stitch over each single_crochet worked previously to join short ends chain 1 round 2 working in ends of the other side of row 1-70 single_crochet in the end of each row 70 single_crochet finish off weave in loose ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l halvorson
